- **Current position: ** I'm a research fellow at the University of Milano - Bicocca since January 2021. I'm working on a project entitled *Spatio-temporal models for spatial network data* under the supervision of [Prof. Riccardo Borgoni](https://www.unimib.it/riccardo-borgoni). 
- **Research interests: ** I work mainly on spatial and spatio-temporal models for data on linear networks (such as car crashes or ambulance interventions). Get the complete curriculum vitae from [here](https://github.com/agila5/cv/raw/master/gilardi_cv.pdf).
